H0.text: Green plover and peewit are alternative names for which British bird. Golden Plover

H1.text: Green plover and peewit are alternative names for which British bird. Redshank

H2.text: Green plover and peewit are alternative names for which British bird. Oystercatcher

H3.text: Green plover and peewit are alternative names for which British bird. Lapwing

A4.text: Northern lapwing, a species of bird found in Eurasia and northern Africa

A5.text: Peewit, a fictional dwarf in the Belgian comics series Johan and Peewit

A6.text: RNAS East Haven, also known as HMS Peewit

A7.text: BirdLife species factsheet for Pluvialis apricaria
